channel.title: Homes on Pestilli Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Pestilli Lab

item.title: Humans, Science and Technology
item.description: The PESTILLI LAB promotes progress in psychological and brain science via the democratization of scientific research, methods, data and infrastructure. We strive to advance societal good by accelerating neuroscientific discovery and education via data-science applications and innovative technology.

item.title: Vision statement
item.description: The PESTILLI LAB promotes progress in psychological and brain science via the democratization of scientific research, methods, data and infrastructure. We strive to advance societal good by accelerating neuroscientific discovery and education via data-science applications and innovative technology.

item.title: We are located in the fast growing city of Austin, Texas
We strive to advance scientific discovery and education to the benefit of human society
We use cloud technology and supercomputers to accelerate human brain discovery and education.
